headline: Nucor: Berkshire Hathaway's Bet On Quality Is Not A Fluke
summary: Nucor stock remains one of the highest-quality companies in the U.S. steel sector. Learn why improving cash flows should benefit investors in the future.

headline: Trump expands 50% tariff on steel and aluminum to 400 additional product types
summary: President Donald Trump’s 50% tariff on imported steel and aluminum has been expanded to include products such as auto parts, EV components, railcars, and marine engines. The post Trump expands 50% tariff on steel and aluminum to 400 additional product types appeared first on FreightWaves.
